body.p: This is the proposed repertoire for PC25 and it is close to final. Some review is still required, however, so there will still be a few changes or additions.
In the first column, the first hex value is the proposed Unicode value for the sign; the hex value in brackets is the Unicode value from AP24.

In the two columns of cuneiform, the left column is the PC25 codepoint in the PC25 font; the right column is the AP24 codepoint in the old PC-all font. This is a temporary proofing step; they are supposed to look the same ...
Clicking on the PCSL name takes you to the PCSL page for the sign.
A preliminary TrueType font for PC25 is available on the PC25 Downloads page.
A data file which should allow comparison of PC25 and AP24 is also available on the PC25 Downloads page..
